data.lyric:
[ti:The Bones]
[ar:Maren Morris]
[al:The Bones]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Bones - Maren Morris
[00:04.13]Lyrics by：Maren Morris/Jimmy Robbins/Laura Veltz
[00:08.26]Composed by：Maren Morris/Jimmy Robbins/Laura Veltz
[00:12.40]We're in the homestretch of the hard times
[00:18.48]We took a hard left but we're alright
[00:25.07]Yeah life sure can try to put love through it but
[00:31.90]We built this right so nothing's ever gonna move it
[00:37.33]When the bones are good the rest don't matter
[00:40.44]Yeah the paint could peel the glass could shatter
[00:43.54]Let it rain 'cause you and I remain the same
[00:49.78]When there ain't a crack in the foundation
[00:53.74]Baby I know any storm we're facing
[00:56.08]Will blow right over while we stay put
[00:59.33]The house don't fall when the bones are good
[01:08.53]Call it dumb luck but baby you and I
[01:14.62]Can't even mess it up although we both try
[01:20.24]No it don't always go the way we planned it
[01:27.20]But the wolves came and went and we're still standing
[01:33.41]When the bones are good the rest don't matter
[01:36.51]Yeah the paint could peel the glass could shatter
[01:39.63]Let it rain 'cause you and I remain the same
[01:45.86]When there ain't a crack in the foundation
[01:49.79]Baby I know any storm we're facing
[01:52.15]Will blow right over while we stay put
[01:55.46]The house don't fall when my bones are good
[02:03.17]When the bones are good
[02:11.26]Bones are good the rest the rest don't matter
[02:16.20]Baby it don't really matter
[02:17.53]Paint could peel the glass
[02:21.09]Oh the glass oh the glass could shatter
[02:23.72]Bones are good the rest the rest don't matter ooh
[02:29.98]Paint could peel the glass the glass could shatter yeah
[02:35.76]When the bones are good the rest don't matter
[02:38.93]Yeah the paint could peel the glass could shatter
[02:41.96]Let it rain
[02:44.16]'Cause you and I remain the same woo
[02:48.19]When there ain't a crack in the foundation woo
[02:52.16]Baby I know any storm we're facing
[02:54.62]Will blow right over while we stay put
[02:57.76]The house don't fall when the bones are good
[03:01.59]Yeah ooh
data.trans:
[ti:The Bones]
[ar:Maren Morris]
[al:The Bones]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.13]//
[00:08.26]//
[00:12.40]我们的苦日子就要到头了
[00:18.48]我们做出了艰难的选择 但我们一定会携手走到最后
[00:25.07]的确 生活可能让爱情经受磨难 但是
[00:31.90]我们的爱坚固无比 不因任何事物动摇
[00:37.33]只要房屋框架坚固 其他都无所谓
[00:40.44]墙面可能剥落 窗户可能破碎
[00:43.54]任凭风吹雨打 我们至死不渝
[00:49.78]只要地基牢固 没有裂缝
[00:53.74]宝贝 我知道 不管遇到多大的风暴
[00:56.08]只要我们坚定不移 就绝不会被打倒
[00:59.33]只要框架坚固 房屋就不会倒塌
[01:08.53]姑且说我们是傻人有傻福吧 但是宝贝 你和我
[01:14.62]虽然遇到过挫折 但绝不会被打败
[01:20.24]的确 生活不可能事事如意
[01:27.20]但那些磨难终将过去 我们依然昂然伫立
[01:33.41]只要房屋框架坚固 其他都无所谓
[01:36.51]墙面可能剥落 窗户可能破碎
[01:39.63]任凭风吹雨打 我们至死不渝
[01:45.86]只要地基牢固 没有裂缝
[01:49.79]宝贝 我知道 不管遇到多大的风暴
[01:52.15]只要我们坚定不移 就绝不会被打倒
[01:55.46]只要框架坚固 房屋就不会倒塌
[02:03.17]只要框架坚固
[02:11.26]框架坚固 其他都无所谓
[02:16.20]宝贝 真的无所谓
[02:17.53]墙面可能剥落 窗户可能破碎
[02:21.09]窗户可能破碎
[02:23.72]框架坚固 其他都无所谓
[02:29.98]墙面可能剥落 窗户可能破碎
[02:35.76]只要房屋框架坚固 其他都无所谓
[02:38.93]墙面可能剥落 窗户可能破碎
[02:41.96]任凭风吹雨打
[02:44.16]我们至死不渝
[02:48.19]只要地基牢固 没有裂缝
[02:52.16]宝贝 我知道 不管遇到多大的风暴
[02:54.62]只要我们坚定不移 就绝不会被打倒
[02:57.76]只要框架坚固 房屋就不会倒塌
[03:01.59]//
